# Load Data
```{r}
df <- read.csv("Datasets/OnlineNewsPopularity.csv")
dim(df)
```
The dataset has 39,644 samples and 61 variables. 

# Missing Data
```{r}
na.by.col <- apply(df, 2, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
any(na.by.col > 0)
```
None of the variables are missing any data.
